Review Name: Wonderful Review Description: Nice product by LG Installation was okay It costed me lot of money as I had to fix the outdoor unit approx 12-13 ft away Energy consumption is still unknown as AC is installed just yesterday. But feature and technology wise, best product I preferred LG over Diakin only for Dual inverter technology. Otherwise price of AC was same. Just I am disappointed due to expensive installation
